title: In Game Freezing?
body:
A week or two ago whenever I was in game, occasionally my game would just freeze for 1-2 seconds and then resume.

I would just be playing and my champion would continue running and then rubberband back to the same spot and champions would teleport to different spaces. 

It isn't a ping issue nor a hardware issue as I have a constant 30ms and my hardware is Nvidia 1060, 16GB or RAM and an i5 processor. (I can't get all the details as I am currently at work posting this)

I've tried repairing the files, uninstalling and reinstalling the game and the problem is still ongoing. Please help me fix this.

replies.body:
When your champion seems to teleport around outside of your commands or "rubberbanding", the most likely culprit is typically an unstable connection. When you have an intermittent connection, the signal could be delayed on its way back to you which causes the champions to jump around.

Let's cover all of our bases first by going through the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
